News.headline: Barking & Dagenham College Academy Update
News.short_description: The Barking and Dagenham College Academy Elite Team are still unbeaten in the 2016/2017 season.
News.description:
The Academy got another win on Wednesday in The National League u19 Alliance Cup, moving into Round 4 of the League Cup. The Elite team beat Braintree Town FC on penalties (13-12).

The goalscorers in the game before penalties were C.Baxanean and S.Cahill and the an of the match for the game was C.Justin. The next upcoming fixture for the Academy Elite Team is Sutton United away.

The Barking and Dagenham College Academy 2nds remain top of their respective league by beating College of North West London 6-0 yesterday.
The goalscorers in the game were A.Jalo 2, K.Davis 2, R.Ogunlowu and K.King, and the man of the match for the game was A.Cook. The upcoming Fixture for the Academy 2nds is Newham College Away.

The Barking and Dagenham College Academy 3rds beat College of Haringey 2-1 to put them 3rd in their respective league.
The goalscorers in this game was K.Alfred who got two goals and the man of the match was F.Cunningham. The upcoming Fixture for the Academy 3rds is Waltham Forest College Away.
